title: A folder named: "to-be-removed"
content:
Hello,

My profile folder get huge!

My FF gets slow, uses a lor of RAM & the profile folder size goes huge.

So, while trying to locate the folder content that can be deleted- I came across a folder named: "to-be-removed".

[ ... AppData\Roaming\Mozilla\Firefox\Profiles\ <profile folder> \storage ]


1. What is the purpose of this folder? 2. Is it safe to delete all of it's content(to empty it)?

Thanks.
creator: av2420

title: Logged out from Firefox everytime when system restarts
content: My FF id gets logged out whenever I restart my computer, due to which all my sync data is removed from that system. My FF id is used on 3-4 systems and 1 mobile but never faced such issue. Also the said problem of logging out is faced from last 7-10 days on only one system. Kindly help me out in the same.
creator: advocate.grover

title: Time out when loged in
content:
Dear Sir/Madam,

For security reasons, when I long in to a Firefox on a different computer, which is not originally mine, how I should set a timeout on that log in? So in case, I forget to sing out, the firefox will sign out automatically?

I save all my passwords in Firefox and I would like to ascertain my privacy maintains.

I appreciate your response in advance.

Kind regards,

Mohsen
creator: m89

title: Since your last update  Firefox window opens too big for my Mac page, so I cannot see/access my desktop files or the menu. How can I make it smaller again?
content: Since your last update Firefox window opens too big for my Mac page so I cannot see/access my desktop files or the menu any more. Is there any way to make it smaller again?
creator: dinadorotheaney

title: EXPORT LOGINS NOT AN OPTION ON MY VERSION OF FIREFOX
content: I am running 78.15.0esr on my macbook pro and when I go to Password manager and pull down the menu under the 3 dots I do not have the option of EXPORT LOGINS... (SEE ATTACHED IMAGE) How can I export my login for 1Password since I do not have the option to do so. I can see my passwords and individually see my passwords but cannot export. Since I have 588 passwords I need to be able to create a cvs file.
creator: danziger1

title: video darker and high contrast
content: when playing videos, firefox makes the videos much darker and higher contrast than the original videos, as well as maxing out the cpu on my laptop when playing video, started a day ago or so.
creator: ftorgrimsen
